name: Space Tower-Defense
description:
Welcome to my second game

This one is only a demo, I had uploaded it on steam and made it public, but then I got informed by another dev, that it´s  name is already licensed, so I had to remove it from steam.

The first 10 waves are    fully playable with a boss fight.

DISCORD

Check out my discord server, where all my other games have their own category.

 Discord Server

SOCIAL MEDIA

       Instagram

 Twitter

Check them out, if you want follow me in my journey to become a big game developer, there are also infos about my new, more realistic    game^^

ATTENTION

Development is paused, because of unbelieveable problems...

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
  • Windows 64bit
  • 8gb memory
PRESS

There are no restrictions on showing or streaming the game, but keep in mind that many things will be changed during development. Get in touch on my discord server if you have any questions or ideas!
